name: Country Racer
description:
Aim :- Travel Forward As Far As Possible

Car Controls :- Arrow Keys

If You Flip, You Have Two Options:  Upright And Random. Upright Spawns You In At The Same Point Whereas Random Spawns You Randomly Somewhere Nearby. You Lose Points For Both Upright And Random, But Upright Costs More Points

Music : E-Dubble - Sidelines (TheBroDelta Remix)
